self.title: CDISC SEND Biological Challenge Agent Category Response Terminology

definition: Terminology related to classifications that describe and group the biological challenge agent.
name: Biological Challenge Agent Category Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Biological Challenge Agent Category Response Terminology

terms.definition: Any organism assigned to the kingdom Bacteria.
Any organism assigned to the kingdom Fungi.
Any infectious agent assigned to the superkingdom Virus.
